records.name: Rosemary Boutique

descriptions.direction: Maafushi is home to Rosemary Boutique. Maafushi Harbor and Bolifushi Island Pier are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Bikini Beach and Rihiveli Beach. Discover the area's water adventures with snorkeling and fishing nearby, or enjoy the great outdoors with hiking/biking trails.
descriptions.general: This property offers a total of 22 units. Visitors may take advantage of the Wi-Fi connection on public areas. The guest house provides 24-hour reception. Some services of Rosemary Boutique may be payable.
descriptions.localized: This property offers a total of 22 units. Visitors may take advantage of the Wi-Fi connection on public areas. The guest house provides 24-hour reception. Some services of Rosemary Boutique may be payable.

records.short_description: Very good hotel. Great location. Beautiful beach.
